website_summaries.verdict: A well-made set with ample components that make it ideal for toddlers as well as suitable for preparing and storing food for babies and youngsters.
pros: A versatile set with user-friendly features ideal for babies to toddlers
Comes with three bowls with handles and lids, fork and spoon set, prep bowl, and masher
Material is free of BPA and other harsh chemicals
cons: The spoons and forks are slightly too large to fit small mouths

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this feeding set
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this feeding set. It comes with 3 diff size bowls with a lid, masher and forks/spoon. Perfect for when you are introducing baby to solid food. Masher is great for avocado.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: I loved this set
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set. I make my baby’s food at home and the mashed and the bowl are perfect for it. No need for extra mess or appliance. The vibrant colors keeps the baby engaged and love the bowls. The suction keeps them safe on the high chair while feeding the baby. I will definitely keep this on the list for future moms.
customer_reviews.author: K Desai

customer_reviews.title: Useful and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my nine month old. They're great; love the lids. I can store leftovers in the fridge for her or take these to go. I don't use the masher much, but I'm sure it'd be fine to make chunky foods for her. Would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: LR507

customer_reviews.title: Could be disigned a bit better
customer_reviews.text: The plastic ware is quite large for a baby eating purees. The bowls are nice, and the masher with the mashing bowl is ok. It didn't puree our food all the way down like we like... May be better when baby starts eating foods with more texture, but as a first time meal I'm not so sure.
customer_reviews.author: JEN DINGLE

customer_reviews.title: Love the bowls hate the spoons
customer_reviews.text: The bowls are the perfect size and the lids are great for saving extra or traveling. The spoons, however, are way too big and bulky for little mouths. It just ends up being a big mess. We had to buy smaller spoons to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: JLofthus

customer_reviews.title: The suction does not work
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten a lot of use out of the toddler utensils and smasher. Otherwise, I bought this set mostly for the bowls because they claim to suction to surface. The suction on these bowls is terrible. They do not stick well at all. Baby can easily pick the bowls up and dump his food.
customer_reviews.author: L.Bond.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice feeding set, everything you need to start with solid food.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Camilo Jiménez

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter and my daughter said she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LEELA N.

customer_reviews.title: good looking and quality
customer_reviews.text: only thing is the suction is not so strong that my LO can take it off from the table
customer_reviews.author: Hongkun L.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this set! The suction cup bowls work great, much to my son's dismay, and the fork and spoons seem comfortable for him to hold. The travel case for the utensils is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great for on the go or at home feeding and self feeding
customer_reviews.author: Gyssa

customer_reviews.title: Must have baby product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I’ve found for making the perfect mashed table food. So easy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Go with only the masher
customer_reviews.text: I got the larger set with the suction bowls. The suction in. The bowls do not work at all. The masher was good though. I would advise not to get the bowls
customer_reviews.author: Aishwarya

customer_reviews.title: Does not suction to high chair tray 😞😞😞😞
customer_reviews.text: Product does not stick to high chair tray unfortunately. Great looking set, so super sad. Contemplating returning.
customer_reviews.author: MeredithMichele

customer_reviews.title: ... with lids in 3 different colors and sizes very easy to use/ store/ on to go
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with lids in 3 different colors and sizes very easy to use/ store/ on to go.lullababy products are Latex free, Lead free, BPA free and Phthalate free safe for babies.I love the mash bowl set! It help with mashing baby foods easily.I can use it wherever I want at home/ on the go. It is easy to clean up and use. The look of this mash bowl set is super cute too! The bonus gift of the spoon and fork set is awesome n colorful. It's perfect to take in a diaper bag with the little case it comes in! Very happy with this set! Best baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't say BPA Free. Not Ideal
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't have BPA free anywhere on the packaging, said Made in China. The spoons/fork are very hard plastic, not ideal for a 6mo old.
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I registered for these bowls because the idea is genius and at first we loved them! But once we used them a couple of times, we realized the suction does not stick at all. We thought our 11 month old was too smart and figured it out but really they just do not stick to the highchair and everything ends up on the floor. We are totally disappointed and would not recommend this product at all, find a different brand for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls bad suction
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls. I use them for snacks on the go and they hold very well. I love the colors and the different variation in sizes. My son loves the spoons and forks. I didn’t really like the suction part because they don’t really stick to anything. My son 9 months is able to pull it right off with ease and 1 day we have cheese puffs everywhere. So be where
customer_reviews.author: India Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Nice colors. The only thing I do not like is how big the utensils are. The spoon holds too much food for a safe bite size amount for a toddler. Other than that, the set is as explained and a very nice addition to our daily eating routine.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: In Loved. I absolutely love this set of mash and ...
customer_reviews.text: In Loved. I absolutely love this set of mash and serve bowls! It works great for quickly mashing food without a mess. The quality is great. I use them all the time for my daughter, they wash perfectly in the dishwasher. I definitely recommend them! Thanks 🙏🏽
customer_reviews.author: Neishka Paulino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love how these are practical, stackable and stick to the table!
customer_reviews.author: COLLEEN

customer_reviews.title: One should buy this product to know how good it is
customer_reviews.text: Just one thing to say.. Complete satisfaction. One should buy this product to know how good it is.
customer_reviews.author: Peeps

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality.. nice set.. my daughter enjoy eating with these and loves to play with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kamalesh S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great combo set!! Easy to use, clean, and pack to go!
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I love the bowls stick it on the table and baby ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the bowls stick it on the table and baby not able too throw .And so much extra in the boxs!
customer_reviews.author: Zsoltne Puspoki

product_meta.title: Baby Bowls Feeding Set with Baby Fork and Baby Spoons | Toddler Bowls with Baby Food Masher |Suction Baby Bowl for Toddlers with Toddler Utensils| BPA Free Baby Shower Registry Must Haves
feature_bullets: EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO FOR BABY FEEDING --> Each baby feeding set comes complete with: 3 different color and sized baby feeding bowls with lids and suction cups to keep them in place, a pair of baby utensils which include colored forks and spoons with a travel case, and a bonus mash and serve bowl, which means you will be ready for mealtime without any additional purchase required. The Perfect Baby Shower Gift Idea!

PERFECT TO GO STORAGE--> Snap tight lids make the baby bowls great for food storage and can be stacked on top of each other. A diaper bag might not be the cleanest place in the world. While traveling your baby utensils will touch every bit of gunk and goo in the bag which eventually will end up in your baby’s mouth. Our travel case ensures that no matter what is in your diaper bag, your baby utensils stay incredibly clean. Our set makes it easy to take food with you wherever you go.

MAKE YOUR OWN BABY FOOD → Ensure your baby’s food has the purest ingredients by making your own baby food with our mash and serve bowl. Making your own baby food will not only save you money but peace of mind of knowing exactly what you are feeding your baby.

INSPECTED AND APPROVED --> Our baby feeding bowls and baby utensils have been certified and free of any harmful chemicals. Each baby feeding set is proven to be Latex free, Lead free, BPA free, and Phthalate free.

LIFETIME MONEY BACK GUARANTEE--> Our product is guaranteed to last while your baby is still in diapers and beyond. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, please let us know and we will either replace the product or give a full refund. We promise this guarantee forever.
